com.facebook.buck.cxx

Interface Linker

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DarwinLinker, GnuLinker, WindowsLinker

    public interface Linker
    An object wrapping a linker, providing its source path and an interface to decorate arguments with specific flags.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Linker.CxxRuntimeType
      The various styles of runtime library to which we can link shared objects.
      static class  Linker.LinkableDepType
      The various ways to link in dependencies.
      static class  Linker.LinkType
      The various ways to link an output file.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Tool getTool() 
      java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> linkWhole(java.lang.String arg) 
      java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> soname(java.lang.String soname) 

    • Method Detail

      • getTool

        Tool getTool()
        Returns:
        Tool representing the linker.

      • linkWhole

        java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> linkWhole(java.lang.String arg)
        Returns:
        the platform-specific way to specify that the library represented by the given argument should be linked whole.

      • soname

        java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> soname(java.lang.String soname)
        Returns:
        the platform-specific way to specify that linker should use the given soname when linking a shared library.
